description: Battery driven IP44 keypad for access control.

paramInformation.label: Automatic Secure Timeout
paramInformation.description: After this time a CLOSE is sent to the door lock.

paramInformation.label: Ring Button OFF Timeout
paramInformation.description: After this time the Door Bell will receive an OFF.

paramInformation.label: Ring Button ON Command
paramInformation.description: Value to send on ring button press.

paramInformation.label: Central Scene ID
paramInformation.description: Defines if different user codes shall cause individual or similar scene ID.

options.label: Constant Scene ID 20 for all User Codes
